Kim Jong Il sends wreath to bier of Kim Ryong Jo 
     Pyongyang, March 6 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il on Sunday sent a wreath to the bier of Kim Ryong Jo, People's Artiste of the April 25 Film Studio of the KPA, expressing deep condolences upon his death.
